a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Maternal mortality vs. health expenditure over time, 1970 to 2015
Health financing is reported as the annual per capita health expenditure and is adjusted for inflation and price
level differences between countries (measured in 2010 international dollars).
Data source: Gapminder (2010); WHO (2019); OECD (2022); Health Expenditure and Financing - OECDstat (2017)
